"Afei EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Amittai ba Jo: "Na Jona soɛɛr dɛ oruguan efi EWURADZE enyim akɔ Tarsis; na ɔkɔr Jopa
dɛ: na ohun hɛn bi a ɔrokɔ Tarsis: nna otuaa kaw na ɔfowee
, #2 Ahe 14.25": dɛ oruguan efi EWURADZE enyim nye hɔn akɔ Tarsis."

"Afei EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Amittai ba Jo: "Na EWURADZE maa aahow kɛsenara bɔe wɔ po no do
dɛ: na ehum dzendzen tui wɔ po no do
, #2 Ahe 14.25": na hɛn no yɛɛ dɛ ɔrobobɔ."

dɛ: na obiara tseatseaa mu frɛfrɛɛ no bosom; na wɔtotoow hɛn no mu eguadze guguu po mu
, #2 Ahe 14.25": ama aayɛ har ama hɔn. Nna Jona dze
column5: oesian akɔ hɛn no n’ase noho beebi; na ɔakɛda heii."
wo nda yi ase nye dɛn? Soɛr
column7: bi a wo nyame no bɔdwen hɛn do
column8: amma yaanntɔr wɔ po yi do."

column5: na yenhu nyia osian ne ntsi ma mbusu yi aba hɛn do. Na wɔtwee tonto

, #2 Ahe 14.25": kyerɛ hɛn nyia osian ne ntsi ma mbusu yi aba hɛn do; eyɛ ebɛn edwuma na ifi hen bae? Ifi ɔman bɛn mu na wo nkyir nye hen?"
ɔsor Nyankopɔn no a ɔyɛɛ po na asaase wewew no."
Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Nna nyimpa no nyim dɛ ofi EWURADZE enyim guanee
ma po yi n’ano ndwe mma hɛn? Osiandɛ nna po no da ho ara hur tutuutu."
na hom ntow me nkyen po no mu; nna po no ano bɔdwe ama hom: na minyim dɛ emi ntsi na ehum kɛse yi aba hom do."

"Afei EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Amittai ba Jo: "Naaso nyimpa no kwaan dzendzen dɛ wɔresan ebodwir asaase wewew do; na woenntum: osiandɛ po no kɔr do araa huur tutuutu hyiaa hɔn."

"Afei EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Amittai ba Jo: "Nna wɔmaa Jona do na wɔtoow no kyeen po no mu: na po no gyaa ne begyabegya yɛ."
"Nna nyimpa no suroo EWURADZE papaara; na wɔbɔɔ okum afɔr maa EWURADZE
"Nna EWURADZE esiesie nam kɛse bi dɛ ɔmmen Jona; na Jona dzii nam no ne yamu ndaansa
